roleset.name: make money from, wages
roleset.note: PROFIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'profit' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from profit.01-v)
PROFIT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry profit.01 and OntoNotes sense groupings profit.01, profit.02; no mappings to VN. Framed by Claire (from profit.01-n)

roles.note: Use ARGM-GOL for beneficiary of profit when present. (from profit.01-n)

example.name: profit-v: transitive, typical
example.text: ...protects against stocks being relentlessly beaten downward by those-1 seeking *trace*-1 to profit from lower prices.

example.name: profit-n: NP only
example.text: group net profit of $ 2.5 billion on revenue of $ 125.1 billion

example.name: profit-n: With manner only
example.text: These investors are looking for a quick profit.

example.name: profit-n: preposition for source argument
example.text: George only made a twenty dollar profit each year on his crafts.

example.name: profit-n: preposition for source argument
example.text: George only made a twenty dollar profit each year on his crafts.

example.name: profit-n: Metaphorical profit, with source only
example.text: I hope there is some profit in your seeing this play.

example.name: profit-n: Source with "of" preposition
example.text: What's the profit of visiting the doctor if you won't take his advice.

roleset.name: producing a profit
roleset.note: PROFITABLE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia for unification as an alias file. (from profitable.01-j)

example.name: profitable-j
example.text: weed management is profitable for irrigated rice farmers in Sahelian West Africa.
example.arg: for irrigated rice farmers in Sahelian West Africa
